baseline_groups.claim_summary: Higher share of political prisoners in Gulag camps leads to higher modern wages in nearby firms.
baseline_groups.notes: No-controls: 0.73 (p=0.003). Full controls: 0.51 (p=0.021). WLS with Oblast FE.

global_notes: Cross-sectional WLS with Oblast FE. Effect reverses without FE and becomes insignificant without employee weights.
